headline: ZScaler, IBD Stock Of The Day, Eyes Breakout After Cybersecurity Firm's 74% Rally
summary: Zscaler is the IBD Stock of the Day for Thursday. Shares of the cybersecurity firm are approaching a cup base buy point amid a strong year. Shares are already above an early entry. Zscaler stock has rallied 74% year to date.

headline: NopalCyber Wins Cybersecurity Solution of the Year for Financial Services, Expanding Track Record of Industry Recognition for Protecting High-Risk Sectors
summary: Company’s managed security solutions honored by 2025 Cybersecurity Breakthrough Awards for impact across financial, legal and other highly regulated industriesNEW YORK, Oct. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- NopalCyber, a leading global provider of managed extended detection and response and attack surface management solutions, today announced it has been named Cybersecurity Solution of the Year for Financial Services in the 2025 Cybersecurity Breakthrough Awards. headline: Best AI Stocks to Invest In for Explosive Q4 Growth
summary: Investing.com -- The integration of artificial intelligence into software platforms is creating unprecedented growth opportunities for select technology companies. Based on key financial metrics including EPS forecasts, revenue growth, and analyst projections, these five software companies stand out as leaders in leveraging AI to drive exceptional business performance.

headline: Hazeltree Report - Consensus Shorts Pivot to Tech and Prestige Brands
summary: NEW YORK & LONDON, October 09, 2025--Against a backdrop of strong global equity performance—the MSCI ACWI Index rose 3.66% in September—short sellers concentrated in technology in the Americas and APAC and in consumer names in EMEA, according to Hazeltree, a leading provider of integrated treasury and liquidity management solutions for alternative asset managers.
